content:
Both "The Americans" and "Homeland" are highly acclaimed shows that are widely available to stream.

**The Americans** is available on:

* Amazon Prime Video (all 6 seasons)
* Hulu (all 6 seasons)
* FX Now (all 6 seasons, with a cable subscription)

**Homeland** is available on:

* Showtime (all 8 seasons, with a subscription)
* Amazon Prime Video (seasons 1-7, with a subscription)
* Hulu (seasons 1-7, with a subscription)
* Netflix DVD (seasons 1-7, on DVD only)

Unfortunately, neither show is currently available on Netflix's streaming service. However, you can access them through Amazon Prime Video or Hulu, which both offer free trials and affordable monthly subscriptions.

If you don't have Amazon Prime Video or Hulu, you can also purchase individual episodes or seasons of both shows on Amazon Video, Google Play, iTunes, or Vudu.

Enjoy your binge-watching adventure!
